gitHubHome.title: Welcome to Stefano Notaro profile page

description.line1: The purpose of this profile is to guide you to my differents repositories in github.
description.line2: This page is organized as follow:
description.line3: On the first section are all my github’s organizations. There I have all the repositories from the same technology.
description.line4: Ex: In “Angular Repositories” you will see all my Angular repositories, with a link to get into the organization.
description.line6: Here is a direct link to the repositories. This ones are organized by organization.

workExperienceData.tester: Tester. Since {{ since }} until {{ until }} ({{ years }} years and {{ months }} months)
workExperienceData.developer: Developer. Since {{ since }} until {{ until }} ({{ years }} years and {{ months }} months)

projectWorkedInData.UPM: With UPM it was my first work experience. I came in as a tester for the planning and inventory modules, which were in development for production.
projectWorkedInData.AGESIC: With AGESIC we were testing with colleagues, the new tool that another provider was developing. The tool consisted of digitizing the Uruguayan government procedures to make it more accessible and easier for Uruguayans to carry out all the procedures, without having to go to an office in person.
projectWorkedInData.VisaNetUruguay: The project with VisaNet consisted of the migration of the database from Oracle 10 to Oracle 12.
